1.title: The Big Surprise

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: The Cryer family has prepared a surprise 50th birthday celebration for Jim, but as he arrives, he is stunned when he sees that his latest mistress, Candace, has become friendly with his daughter Amanda and is partaking in the festivities. Upon Wyatt's homecoming from rehab, the family is disheartened to see that he hasn't changed at all.

2.title: Playing in the Deep End

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Jim has repeatedly requested that Candace leave the family's home, but she continues to disobey him by staying with Amanda. Hanna, is startled when she stumbles upon Candace shuffling through Katheryn's bedroom.

3.title: Beautifully Dysfunctional

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Candace threatens to ruin Jim's career.

4.title: Entering the Race

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: After Jim announces that he plans to run for Governor, Candace holds the affair against Jim and threatens to reveal the news to the media.

5.title: A Woman's Pride

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: After her eviction, Hanna goes to Benny with questions regarding possibly adjusting the mortgage on her home. David formulates a plan to get rid of Candace for good. Hanna is informed about Katheryn's diagnosis of cancer.

6.title: Angry Sex

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Jim falls into Candace's vindictive trap once again and David is irked by the fact that Jim is unable to control himself, which leads him to take charge of the matter. Back at the Cryer mansion. Celine has become envious of Hanna.

7.title: A True Friend

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Jeffery and Wyatt help Amanda move into her new apartment.

8.title: The Criminal

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Benny is arrested and framed with a drug possession charge after borrowing a car for a date.

9.title: The Set Up

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Hanna finds out that Benny happened to be behind the wheel of Candace's car. David reveals how he participated in the set-up. Katheryn ends up bonding with Hanna over their issues.

10.title: Number Nine

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: After all the issues going on around her, Amanda tries to commit suicide after an altercation with Candace sends her over the edge. Katheryn shames Candace directly after Jim reveals his affair.

11.title: Not My Daughter

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Katheryn tells everyone that she is leaving for vacation, but that turns out to be false. Veronica agrees to work on Benny's case. Wyatt is shocked when a previous girlfriend shows up.

12.title: In Recovery

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Jim and Candace end up in a verbal and physical altercation. Amanda is in recovery while Katheryn might have to prepare for surgery. Wyatt receives another visitor from his past.

13.title: What Are You Doing Here?

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Information is discovered by a detective that links Benny and Tony. Veronica continues to work toward answers for Benny's case. Laura is kept away from Wyatt by Jeffrey.

14.title: My Name Is Veronica

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Veronica collects enough evidence to send it off to David, which in turn exposes the conspiracy. Katheryn gets nervous when her secret almost goes public.

15.title: The Truth Will Set You Free

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: After her secret is revealed, Katheryn tells everyone what she really knows about Jim's secret activities. Jeffrey finally discloses his love for Wyatt.

16.title: No More Hiding

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Jeffrey tells his parents that he's gay. Hanna discloses that Tony is actually Benny's father. Candace informs Amanda that her parents are keeping her inheritance. Wyatt relapses and has a accident,

17.title: The Black Sedan

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Candace persuades Amanda to be assertive; Hanna awaits an update on Benny's condition.

18.title: Wyatt's Nightmare

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: After a hit-and-run accident, Wyatt kills a little girl and Benny is on life support; Jim's campaign is in trouble; Amanda's on the verge of a breakdown; Hanna hears bad news about Benny.

19.title: Family Issues

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: When Celine tries to destroy her accountability, Hanna clashes with Tony about keeping Benny on life support.

20.title: Unanswered Calls

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Jeffrey realizes that Wyatt is responsible for Lizzie's death and Benny's condition.

21.title: Why Didn't You Tell Me?

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Jeffery tells Wyatt that the man he hit is Hanna's son. Elsewhere, Candace finds out that Benny is in the county hospital and that the doctors want to take him off life support, so she begs Jim to move him to a private hospital. Meanwhile, Katheryn is buckling under the guilt of Wyatt's crime, and Veronica decides not to tell the Cryers about the location of Jeffery's car-the black sedan Wyatt drove when he critically injured Benny and killed a little girl. Finally, Amanda, who has been exhibiting increasingly disturbing behavior, asks Jeffery where she can buy a gun.

22.title: Protecting Wyatt

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Jim tries to keep Wyatt out of jail. Tony serves Hanna with court papers.

23.title: Amanda's Revenge

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: Amanda seeks revenge on the professor by sneaking into his bedroom and insulting him. Meanwhile, Candace represents Hanna in her fight to keep Benny on life support.

24.title: Maggie's Plan

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: Wyatt's actions and Candace's threats cause a great deal havoc as Jim prepares to announce his candidacy for governor.

25.title: March for Justice

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

25.plot: The judge rewards Tony in his case against Hanna; Hanna pleads with Tony to keep Benny on life support.

26.title: Starting the Race

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

26.plot: Candace makes an attempt to blackmail Jim and David during a campaign event, and Wyatt is arrested.

27.title: You'll Be Sorry

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

27.plot: Wyatt is arrested. Candace is kidnapped by the Malones. Benny shows signs of brain activity.

28.title: The Confession

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

28.plot: Jim concocts a cover story to protect his son. Meanwhile Amanda gets a gun and Candace tells the truth about her pregnancy.

29.title: Donald

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

29.plot: Jim proclaims his son's innocence. Quincy pays Hanna a surprise visit in search of Candace.

30.title: The Awakening

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

30.plot: Benny wakes up from his coma.

31.title: The Vulnerable

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

31.plot: Benny prepares for his release from the hospital. Hanna plans to testify against Wyatt. Maggie tries to seduce David.

32.title: The Sarandon Hotel

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

32.plot: After escaping her kidnappers, Candace asks Warlock for help. Jeffrey is seduced by Melissa.

33.title: Again and Again

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

33.plot: Benny goes home. Candace finds out Quincy is looking for her. Jim puts Plan B into effect. David and Jeffrey get caught. Amanda leaves with Quincy.

34.title: Something's Wrong with Amanda

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

34.plot: Amanda leaves the Cryer estate with Quincy. Candace hides out at Jeffrey's apartment. Katheryn and Celine get into another confrontation.

35.title: Norman Hewens

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

35.plot: A news report claiming that another person is responsible for the hit-and-run saves Wyatt from jail. Katheryn berates Jim about his evil deeds. Hanna attempts to apologize to Jim for her hand in the tragedy.

36.title: Checkmate

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

36.plot: Jim is confronted by Carlos, his illegitimate son with Celine. Katheryn's celebratory dinner party goes awry when Quincy, Candace's ex, shows up as Amanda's date. David and Veronica continue to battle over the fact that Jeffrey is gay. Candace seeks her revenge on Jim. Maggie makes another attempt to sleep with David.

1.title: The Power Dance

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Hanna hosts a party for Benny; Jim is held hostage; and David is tempted to sleep with Maggie.

2.title: The War Room

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Jim is still being tormented by Candace. Hanna seeks information about Quincy's mother so she can get one step closer to finding her grandson. Benny is furious when he finds out that Candace sneaked out the house, so he leaves to find Jeffrey. Wyatt is still reading Jim's texts and drinking. Veronica grows impatient waiting on hotel security to open David's room.

3.title: A Southern Brawl

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Veronica and Maggie fight, But David manages to pull them to apart.

4.title: Amanda's Room

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Hanna makes a heart stopping discovery.

5.title: The Press Conference

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Hanna finds Amanda dead in her room, and she, Wyatt, and Celine are overcome with shock.

6.title: A Tragic Day

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Candace promises Benny that she's legit now. Jim is lost in the wrong section of town until a good Samaritan gets him back to his home.

7.title: April 7, 1979

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Katheryn tells the story of how she first met Jim and gets into another fight with Celine.

8.title: In Crisis

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Wyatt argues with Jim over the emails he had read. Jeffrey has a surprise guest at his home. Benny and Hanna go to visit Candace.

9.title: A Talk with Jim

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Jim confronts Wyatt about what he said in the last episode, and Wyatt explains why he really loathes his father and reveals Jim's numerous affairs, including the fling that he had with Celine while Wyatt was at camp being molested.

10.title: Oscar

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Hanna has the cleaning crew clean Amanda's room, but Jim is not pleased.

11.title: Unglued

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Katheryn and Jim plan for a divorce. Candace buys a new house. David is angry at Veronica for telling Quincy to beat up Jeffrey. Veronica goes to the Sarandon Hotel and causes big trouble.

12.title: Enough Is Enough

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Jeffrey stands up to Veronica .Quincy comes to Hanna's house with her grandson. Veronica burns down her house with David in the bed.

13.title: 2 Funerals

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Veronica starts a fire that destroys her mansion and almost claims David's life. Benny, who's searching for his nephew, plans to bail Quincy out of jail.

14.title: In Memoriam

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Amanda is mourned and laid to rest. Katheryn and Jim confront Candace about Amanda and knock her out.

15.title: Nine Lives

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Jim takes Wyatt out of the Cryer Mansion.

16.title: The Cougar

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Hanna is still in shock over what she has just witnessed: her son, Benny, in bed with Veronica, a married woman.

17.title: Candace Young Esquire

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Candace shows Benny where she works. Wyatt tries to tell the officers about the switch and he ends up fighting off his cellmate. Benny gets Quincy out of jail, only to kill him.

18.title: Benny Does Battle

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: While Quincy is hurt from the accident, Benny checks him for info on his nephew; afterward, he frames him for drug possession.

19.title: Quincy Jr.

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Hanna is reunited with her grandson.

20.title: A Home for Q

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Candace learns that Hanna is seeking custody of Q; and the Cryers and Harringtons try to convince the D.A. that Wyatt's taped confession is a misunderstanding.

21.title: Candace's Closing

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Candace buys property with the money she extorted from Jim; and Jim is interviewed on TV.

22.title: Diana Winchill

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: While Jim is being interviewed by Dianna Winchill, a surprise guest arrives. Veronica tells Jim that she had planned Wyatt's attack in prison, leading Jim to attack her and later put a hit on her, Professor Cannon, and Prison Guard Terrell.

23.title: Vetted

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: Hanna grows suspicious of Benny's involvement with Veronica and how he acquired his new house; Quincy drives a car through Hanna's home in spite of revenge; Candace decides to let her guard down with Oscar.

24.title: Sheep's Clothing

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: Hanna becomes devastated when she learns that Quincy set her house on fire; Maggie tries to talk David into running for Governor; Jeffrey gives Wyatt the necessary ammunition to take his parents down.

25.title: When the Chickens Come Home

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

25.plot: Hanna and Benny force Candace to tell the truth about everything; In the end, Quincy ends up being stabbed to death by Jeffrey.

1.title: The Waters Run Deep

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Candace and Jeffrey disagree on what to do with Quincy's body when interrupted by a knock on the door.

2.title: Paid in Full

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Candace and Jeffery get a visit from police because of a nosy neighbor; Jeffery panics and ends up in a bad situation;

3.title: The Right Medicine

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Quincy wakes up and begs for Candace's help; Benny asks Warlock and Mitch for help with the company; Jeffery gets sexually harassed by Officer Justin after a DUI arrest; Quincy's sister is getting worried about him.

4.title: An Evil Soul

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Candace's lies catch up with her especially when Warlock comes for a visit; Wyatt fakes his urine test; Benny has suspicions about his friends; Maggie tries to get David released; Jennifer tries to intimidate Katheryn.

5.title: Immunity

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Benny agrees to help Candace hide evidence in Quincy's murder; Jeffery finds out about Wyatt's immunity deal for him and refuses to testify unless the Cryer and Harrington trials can be separate;

6.title: Making Millions

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Quincy Jr. passes out on Hanna after getting really sick and is taken to the hospital and placed in ICU;

7.title: A Front Row Seat

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Maggie's lie to David could cause her to lose him forever; Katheryn gets out of jail but she can't find anyone to help Jim or Veronica; Quita pays a visit to Candace. Hanna goes back to work but all is not what it seems.

-1.title: Boom Boom Bang

episode of.title: The Haves and the Have Nots (TV Series 2013– )

-1.plot: As Hanna and her daughter come to an agreement she begins to reveal situations from her past.

imdb.plot outline: The Haves and the Have Nots is a prime time cable Drama Show writer by Tyler Perry, focusing on the interacting lives of the Rich Cryer and Harrington families, and the poor Young family. Hanna Young, a struggling maid working for the Cryers, is a woman who was not the best person in the past but is now a woman of faith. But her faith, and her resolve are tested when she finds out that her Promiscuous Daughter Candace Young(To whom she tries desperately to avoid) has included Herself into the lives of her Mothers employer Jim Cryer and his Family.
imdb.title: The Haves and the Have Nots

other companies.name: Law Offices of Mark S. Temple

plot: Centers on the rich Cryer and Harrington families, "the haves," and the poor Young family, "the have nots," whose lives intertwine when Candace Young begins working for the Cryers.::Podsto

_The Haves and the Have Nots_ (qv) is a prime time cable Drama Show writer by Tyler Perry, focusing on the interacting lives of the Rich Cryer and Harrington families, and the poor Young family. Hanna Young, a struggling maid working for the Cryers, is a woman who was not the best person in the past but is now a woman of faith. But her faith, and her resolve are tested when she finds out that her Promiscuous Daughter Candace Young(To whom she tries desperately to avoid) has included Herself into the lives of her Mothers employer Jim Cryer and his Family.::erinsm
